resources.string: In order to post a ride, start by clicking the post button ride on the bottom of the main page. This will bring you to the Post a Ride page. Here you can input all The information about your ride including the pick-up and drop-off locations, date, time and if you will be the driver or the passenger. After clicking the driver or passenger button at the bottom of the page, a confirmation dialog will appear. You can choose to close the dialog and adjust your ride or you can confirm the post and the ride will appear in the appropriate ride and my trips boards.

In order to accept a ride you must first decide if you wish to be a passenger or a driver. If you would like to be a driver, click on the available requests tab from the left slide menu of the main page. If you wish to be a passenger, click on the available rides tab on the same slide menu. After clicking on your desired tab, a page with a table of rides will open. The table will show the time, date and description of the ride along with the rating of the user who posted it. By clicking on a row in the table, a dialogue will open with more detailed information about the ride. In this dialogue you can choose to cancel and continue looking for rides or you can accept the ride which will enter your my trips board.

In order to start a ride you must go to your my trips page and click on the ride you would like to start. When you click on a ride a dialogue will open giving you the option to start a ride or to cancel and close the dialogue. Both the driver and the passenger need to start the trip. After starting the trip, if you click on the ride again, the start ride button will become an end ride button. Clicking this will end the ride and once again, both the driver and the passenger need to end the ride. Ending the ride will open up the review page.
